ISSUE.TITLE: typo on documentation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On Install and Upgrade and more specific on the PostgreSQL database you have `--db postgresql` instead of `-db postgresql`

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Adding troubleshooting and prereqss Organizing the requirements and prerequisites and adding troubleshooting

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Docs/1.0.0 updates (#705) * Cleanup and updates Based on feedback from slack and fixing some links * Adding further clarifications Based on Slack comments * Adding local storage option Also updating for annotations vs completions text that I missed oops * hiding local storage for now will bring back later * fixing broken links Slack feedback and noticing broken links and another broken image * Add additional docker compose details yup * Update api.md Adding link to new Swagger hosting * Update api.md Revising the reference to the API doc hosting and format * Adding troubleshooting and prereqss Organizing the requirements and prerequisites and adding troubleshooting * Fixing typo! Per issue #704 * Install troubleshooting addition Info about making sure you're on latest LS * Adding troubleshooting for Win10 blank page encounters edit the registry * Update troubleshooting Removing instructions for editing Win10 registry since MIME type is fixed by a patch, will migrate content elsewhere * Fixing broken links in export Broken anchor links in export doc, fixing * Review feedback Updating install doc, export description, and ML doc link per review feedback from niklub * Update ml.md
